import React from "react"; import './user-profile.css' import ChangePassword from './ChangePassword/change-password' import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardFooter, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; import { Component } from "react"; class UserProfile extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { isDisplayForm: false } } OpenForm = () =>{ this.setState({ isDisplayForm : !this.state.isDisplayForm }); } onCloseForm =() =>{ this.setState({ isDisplayForm : !this.state.isDisplayForm }); } render(){ var {isDisplayForm} = this.state; var show = isDisplayForm ? : ''; return ( <>
{show}

Profile
Full Name:

Male Female

Email:

Password:

*******************
); } } export default UserProfile;
